sn29.7:1.2: Ekamantam nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn29.7:1.3: “ko nu kho, bhante, hetu, ko paccayo, yena midhekacco kayassa bheda param marana andajanam naganam sahabyatam upapajjati”ti?
sn29.7:2.1: “Idha, bhikkhu, ekacco kayena dvayakari hoti, vacaya dvayakari hoti, manasa dvayakari hoti.
sn29.7:2.5: ‘aho vataham kayassa bheda param marana andajanam naganam sahabyatam upapajjeyyan’ti.
sn29.7:2.6: So kayassa bheda param marana andajanam naganam sahabyatam upapajjati.
sn29.7:2.7: Ayam kho, bhikkhu, hetu, ayam paccayo, yena midhekacco kayassa bheda param marana andajanam naganam sahabyatam upapajjati”ti.
